mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, REGION_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_FBNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardWriter}, 1, 'M', #{boardTitle}, 'test' )
INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM ( ROOM_NO, BOARD_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_THUMBNAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_CRNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_FBNO.CURRVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{profileImg} )
INSERT INTO CHAT_MEMBER ( ROOM_NO, USER_ID, USER_RANK ) VALUES ( SEQ_CRNO.CURRVAL, #{boardWriter}, 'A' )
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NO, BOARD_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_DATE FROM CHAT_ROOM ORDER BY ROOM_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO CHAT_MEMBER ( ROOM_NO, USER_ID, USER_RANK ) VALUES ( #{roomNo}, #{userId}, 'M' )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_CHAT_MEMBER FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}

SELECT ROOM_NO, BOARD_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_DATE, ROOM_THUMBNAIL, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_DATE, INSERT_DATE, CHAT_COUNT FROM CHAT_ROOM JOIN CHAT_MEMBER USING (ROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROOM_NO, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_DATE FROM CHAT WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM CHAT GROUP BY ROOM_NO) ) USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC

SELECT CHAT_NO, ROOM_NO, CHAT_WRITER, CHAT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CHAT_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "FMMM"월 "FMDD"일" DAY') AS "CHAT_DATE", TO_CHAR(CHAT_TIME, 'AM FMHH:FMMI') AS "CHAT_TIME", PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME FROM CHAT JOIN MEMBER ON (CHAT_WRITER = USER_ID) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND (SELECT TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}) <= TO_CHAR(CHAT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY CHAT_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_MEMBER SET CHAT_COUNT = 0 WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NO, USER_ID, USER_RANK, INSERT_DATE, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME FROM CHAT_MEMBER JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_ID) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY INSERT_DATE ASC
SELECT ROOM_NO, BOARD_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_DATE, ROOM_THUMBNAIL FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHAT_NO, ROOM_NO, CHAT_WRITER, CHAT_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, #{roomNo}, #{chatWriter}, #{chatContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_MEMBER SET CHAT_COUNT = CHAT_COUNT + 1 WHERE USER_ID != #{chatWriter} AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_NO, ROOM_NO, CHAT_WRITER, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_DATE, CHAT_TIME, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT CHAT_NO, ROOM_NO, CHAT_WRITER, CHAT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CHAT_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "FMMM"월 "FMDD"일" DAY') AS "CHAT_DATE", TO_CHAR(CHAT_TIME, 'AM FMHH:FMMI') AS "CHAT_TIME", PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME FROM CHAT JOIN MEMBER ON (CHAT_WRITER = USER_ID) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND CHAT_WRITER = #{chatWriter} ORDER BY CHAT_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
